Frankly, I don't understand the question., but I won't be offended if you extract Slax from HawkPE and leave out the stuf I added to /modules.  But the point of adding those modules, is to provide users w/ a leg up, so they don't have to learn about making/downloading modules in order to use it (Slax.)

I think if you were really familiar w/ Slax, familiar enough to be discriminating, you'd already have downloaded the stock Slax CD on your own.  IAC, be my guest:  --  The Hawk  --
Alright, like I said, help yourself....

HKTL_HIDEWIN.AA

I386/SYSTEM32/cmdow.exe

preludexl:  I will review the remastering instructions in the README, as they may not be clear, but that's where you'd go to update your disc.

Having said that, I have a working #40 build and will post it in the next seven days.  Later:  --  The Hawk  --
